description: This is a test class for the TodoController in a Spring-based backend application, using MockMvc for testing various REST endpoints related to Todo items such as creation, listing, updating, toggling completion, and deletion.

classes.name: TodoControllerTest
classes.description: Test class for the TodoController, containing tests for CRUD operations and toggling complete status of Todo items.

methods.name: create_success_shouldReturn201AndBody
methods.description: Tests successful creation of a Todo item and verifies the JSON response.

methods.name: create_validationError_shouldReturn400WithErrors
methods.description: Tests validation failure during Todo creation and expects a 400 Bad Request with error details.

methods.name: list_success_shouldReturn200AndArray
methods.description: Tests retrieval of the list of Todo items successfully.

methods.name: getById_notFound_shouldReturn404
methods.description: Tests GET request for non-existent Todo ID, expecting a 404 Not Found.

methods.name: put_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests full update (PUT) of a Todo item, verifying the updated details.

methods.name: put_missingTitle_shouldMapIllegalArgumentTo400
methods.description: Tests that missing title during a PUT update results in a 400 error.

methods.name: patch_success_shouldReturnUpdatedResponse
methods.description: Tests partial update (PATCH) of a Todo item.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldReturnUpdatedState
methods.description: Tests toggling the completion status of a Todo item.

methods.name: delete_success_shouldReturn204
methods.description: Tests successful deletion of a Todo item.
